alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Bradley; Hamilton; Marion; McMinn; Meigs; Rhea; Roane; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 1:26PM CDT until August 12 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Rhea County in east Tennessee... Northwestern Bradley County in east Tennessee... Sequatchie County in east Tennessee... Meigs County in east Tennessee... Bledsoe County in east Tennessee... Northwestern McMinn County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Marion County in east Tennessee... Northeastern Hamilton County in east Tennessee... Southwestern Roane County in east Tennessee... * Until 315 PM EDT/215 PM CDT/. * At 226 PM EDT/126 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Spencer to 7 miles north of Gruetli- Laager to 6 miles north of Monteagle, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Dayton, Dunlap, Pikeville, Decatur, Soddy-Daisy, Spring City, Lakesite, Graysville, Cartwright, and Flat Top Mountain. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Bledsoe; Bradley; Hamilton; Marion; McMinn; Meigs; Rhea; Roane; Sequatchie
